Internal dataset type checkers

Source: R/check_data_type.R
data_checkers.Rd

Internal helpers to check argument values.

Usage

check_data_adr(
  .data,
  arg = rlang::caller_arg(.data),
  call = rlang::caller_env()
)

check_data_drug(
  .data,
  arg = rlang::caller_arg(.data),
  call = rlang::caller_env()
)

check_data_link(
  .data,
  arg = rlang::caller_arg(.data),
  call = rlang::caller_env()
)

check_data_mp(
  .data,
  arg = rlang::caller_arg(.data),
  call = rlang::caller_env()
)

check_data_meddra(
  .data,
  arg = rlang::caller_arg(.data),
  call = rlang::caller_env()
)

check_data_smqlist(
  .data,
  arg = rlang::caller_arg(.data),
  call = rlang::caller_env()
)

Arguments

.data

The dataset to check.

arg

Helper to format the error message.

call

Helper to format the error message.

Value

An error if the dataset is invalid. Nothing in other cases

Functions

  • check_data_adr(): adr data checker

  • check_data_drug(): drug data checker

  • check_data_link(): link checker

  • check_data_mp(): mp checker

  • check_data_meddra(): meddra checker

  • check_data_smqlist(): smq_list data checker

Examples


drug_valid <- data.frame(
  DrecNo = 1, UMCReportId = 1, MedicinalProd_Id = 1, Drug_Id = 1)

 vigicaen:::check_data_drug(drug_valid, ".data")
